https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/s0UKsoyand7OmqUmtuBPK1qwVBZ.jpg What is it like to be a black person in Germany? And what needs to change? DW's Jana Pareigis traveled across the country and met other black people living in Germany, including the artist Robin Rhose, and the rapper Samy Deluxe. Afro.Germany
